entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, New Tecumseth
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries at times heavy or rain showers. High 6 with temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Rain showers or flurries at times heavy beginning early in the afternoon then changing to flurries at times heavy in the afternoon. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 late in the morning. High 6 with temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
